files.name: ui_sheen_soft_512_v1.png
files.prompt: A soft glossy specular highlight overlay (alpha-friendly) for pastel glass UI buttons. Transparent background, only the sheen. Diagonal gentle gradient from top-left to center with subtle bloom. No text. No icons. Clean, minimal, cute mobile game UI style.
files.notes: Used as ::after overlay on mint buttons/pills. Prefer semi-transparent white sheen, smooth edges.

files.name: ui_rim_highlight_512_v1.png
files.prompt: A rim highlight ring overlay (alpha-friendly) for rounded rectangle buttons. Transparent background, only the rim highlight. Subtle bright edge on top and softer darker edge on bottom, like a puffy glass button. No text. No icons. Cute pastel mobile game UI.
files.notes: Used as ::before overlay on mint buttons/panels to sell thickness.

files.name: fx_ripple_ring_512_v1.png
files.prompt: A circular ripple ring effect sprite (alpha-friendly). Transparent background, thin soft ring with gentle glow, suitable for a placement shockwave on a board cell. Pastel light cyan/white glow. No text.
files.notes: Optional. Can be replaced by pure CSS radial-gradient.

files.name: fx_burst_star_512_v1.png
files.prompt: A small starburst / sparkle burst effect sprite (alpha-friendly). Transparent background, cute pastel star-shaped burst with soft glow. No text.
files.notes: Optional. Used for flip burst accents.
